Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Annunciation and the 29th of the Coptic Month:

Text.Language: <ere ]macnou]: p~yel/l n~te piaggeloc: ,ere ]cemne: p~hiwis n~te nip~rov/t/c
Hail to the Mother of God, the rejoicing of the angels. Hail to the chaste: the preaching of the prophets.

<ere y/e~tacjem h~mot: P[oic sop neme: ,ere y/e~tac[i n~ten piaggeloc: m~v~rasi m~pikocmoc
Hail to her who has found grace, the Lord is with you. Hail to her who received from the angel, the joy of the world.
